data.text: “Na afei tie, Yakob me somfo,
Sɛɛ na Awurade se,
Na mehwie nsu agu asase a awo no so,
Wobefifi sɛnea sare fifi wɔ mmoa adidibea,
Obi bɛka se, ‘Meyɛ Awurade de’;
“Sɛɛ na Awurade
Hena na ɔne me sɛ? Ma ɔmpae mu nka.
Mommma mo ho mpopo, munnsuro.
Wɔn a wɔyɛ ahoni nyinaa nka hwee,
Hena na ɔbɔ onyame na ogu ohoni,
Ɔno ne wɔn a wɔte sɛ no nyinaa anim begu ase;
Ɔtomfo fa nʼatonnade
Duadwumfo de hama susuw
Otwitwaa sida,
Ɛyɛ nea onipa de sɔ ogya;
Ɔde dua no mu fa sɔ ogya;
Nkae no ɔde yɛ onyame, ne ohoni;
Wonnim hwee, na wɔnte hwee ase;
Obiara nna nnwen ho,
Saa onipa no di nsõ, nnaadaa koma ma no to kwan;
“Kae saa nneɛma yi, Yakob,
Mapra wo mfomso agu te sɛ omununkum
Momfa ahosɛpɛw nto dwom, ɔsorosoro,
“Sɛɛ na Awurade se,
nea ɔsɛe atoro adiyifo nsɛnkyerɛnne
nea ɔma nʼasomfo nsɛm ba mu
nea ɔka kyerɛ asubun se, ‘Yow,
nea ɔka wɔ Kores ho se, ‘Ɔyɛ me guanhwɛfo
